# AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.denied

**Case**

A person denies the app permission to add audio to calls.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Permissions

- **AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.serviceDisabled**: A person disables this service for all apps.
- **AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.undetermined**: The app hasn’t requested a person’s permission to add audio to calls.
- **AVAudioApplication.MicrophoneInjectionPermission.granted**: A person grants the app permission to add audio to calls.
